en.today: You'll see things plainly as the Scorpio moon leaves little room for misinterpretation, dear Aries. Harness these vibes by defining your own bottom line, considering what you're willing to sacrifice in exchange for something else. Negotiations, compromise, shared resources, and commitment correspond with the day's themes, so be mindful to consider these aspects of your life. Luna aligns with the nodes of fate midafternoon, inspiring you to weigh your options from behind the scenes. Measure your actions and words to reflect specific desires and goals. Switch gears and embrace intimate settings with your favorite person once Jupiter stirs later tonight.

en.today: Navigate your emotions with purpose, dear Leo, as the Scorpio moon activates your solar fourth house. Many bubbles to the surface under this cosmic climate, but you'll feel less inclined to entertain feelings that take away from your power or lust for life. Reinforce the corners of your heart that inspire you to reach for more, fueling the passions that define you and the way that you love. If others cannot match your energy, find someone who can. The nodes of fate direct you toward relationships and commitments that can reshape your future for the better this afternoon. Meditate on your grandest aspirations later tonight when Luna and Jupiter align.

en.today: Try to see yourself through the eyes of your most devoted companions, dearest Taurus. As the Scorpio moon highlights your closest relationships, it'll be essential to love and appreciate yourself with as much enthusiasm as you give to others. Your social life picks up later today when Luna connects with the nodes of fate, and new alliances could emerge. Surround yourself with people you gain inspiration and motivation from, developing friendships that can transform the way you approach your own aspirations. Your voice casts a wide net once Jupiter activates tonight, so choose a message that's meaningful to you.

kh.today: ព្យាយាមមើលខ្លួនអ្នកតាមរយៈក្រសែភ្នែករបស់ដៃគូដែលលះបង់បំផុតរបស់អ្នកគឺ Taurus ដែលជាទីស្រឡាញ់បំផុត។ក្នុងនាមជា Scorpio Monl បានបង្ហាញពីទំនាក់ទំនងជិតស្និទ្ធបំផុតរបស់អ្នកវាចាំបាច់ត្រូវស្រឡាញ់និងកោតសរសើរចំពោះខ្លួនអ្នកជាមួយនឹងភាពរីករាយនៅពេលដែលអ្នកផ្តល់ឱ្យអ្នកដទៃ។ជីវិតសង្គមរបស់អ្នកបានកើនឡើងនៅពេលក្រោយនៅពេលដែល Luna ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយថ្នាំងនៃវាសនាហើយសម្ព័ន្ធភាពថ្មីអាចលេចចេញមក។នៅជុំវិញខ្លួនអ្នកជាមួយមនុស្សដែលអ្នកទទួលបានការបំផុសគំនិតនិងការលើកទឹកចិត្តពីការអភិវឌ្ឍមិត្តភាពដែលអាចផ្លាស់ប្តូររបៀបដែលអ្នកទាក់ទងនឹងសេចក្តីប្រាថ្នារបស់អ្នក។សំលេងរបស់អ្នកចាក់សំណាញ់ធំទូលាយនៅពេលដែល Jupiter សកម្មនៅយប់នេះដូច្នេះសូមជ្រើសរើសសារដែលមានអត្ថន័យសម្រាប់អ្នក។

en.today: Fight for the changes you wish to embody, dear Gemini, as the Scorpio moon brings transformation through hard work. Though stepping into your power could feel overwhelming at times, you'll become lighter and more confident with each burden that is shed. Face sacrifice head-on, giving yourself the time and energy to focus on your deepest desires. Massive payoffs may find you midafternoon while the nodes of fate activate, helping you build status, success, and a future worth celebrating. Home in on what you hope to manifest next when Luna aspects Jupiter later tonight, outlining a plan to reinforce these goals.
